entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IndexOutOfRangeException from VisualBasic.Binder.ReportOverloadResolutionFailureForASingleCandidate #61193
  • [LSP] Re-enable LSP GoToDefinition + GoToImplementation integration tests #61188
  • ValueTrackingTree visual leaks WPF animation #61186
  • Fade-out of unused variables or parameters and dark theme #61185
  • `not` not appearing after `and`/`or` in pattern. #61184
  • "Add null check" quickfix should support generating ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull() calls #61181

Closed

  • Wrong compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initilizer #60960
    Compiler.Next
  • Escape characters on paste #31869
    17.3
  • Cleanup on save when fixing merge conflicts removes ALL usings #61159

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Add pointer for `AnalysisLevel` to warning waves doc #61196
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • test #61194
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Disable GoToDef/GoToImpl integration tests #61190
    Area-IDE, Integration-Test, LSP
  • Avoid yield in ReadAsync/WriteAsync unless on main thread #61187
    Area-IDE
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Switch smart-copy-paste tests to use raw-string-literals. #61180
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we do string-copy-paste before format-on-paste #61183
    Area-IDE, Next
  • RazorLineFormattingOptions #61054
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update file types reviewers #61192
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • assert property is override when reporting `ERR_AutoPropertyMustOverrideSet` #61125
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • EnC: Implements support for changing namespace declarations #61176
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61191
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update Analyzer Samples.md #51238
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Fix compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initializer #61040
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Bump RichNav timeout to 260 min #60909
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Generate Variable: parameter does not get introduced prior to optional parameters/params parameter #61138
    Area-IDE, Next
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for smart string/copy paste when the destination is a raw string literal. #61177
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61198
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Use auto-properties for PropertyOverrides #61107
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for implementing static members in derived interfaces. #61134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid checking HasValue in nullable comparison for non-default constants #60405
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #56328
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState #61131
    Area-IDE
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Portable to 1.7.0-beta-21315-03 #54131
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.3
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Change IDE0052 title for properties when using increment operator #61166
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Improve performance of StringText.Write & StringBuilderText.Write on .NET Core #61167
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE
